summary: Change voice on shouts to a more anime friendly version
descriptionHtml:
Contains Semi-adult content (She got racy in the throw voice taunts)

I have started working to overhaul the voices in skyrim to be more anime and even tweak dialogue a bit but not stray to far from the original.
These files replace all the shouts and the voice throw sounds to sound more anime.

Demo Video   http://www.twitch.tv/maveric83eq/b/313842732

The throw voice is definitely worth the mod imo

If you know anyone interested or are yourself in helping overhaul the audio there are literally 30k audio files per gender. I am only working on the female roles atm, but if any male VA\'s want to do a lot of the legwork themselves, I would be more than happy to package it along side.


-Warning- I do not know how the mod manager works as I have never used it personally, I do everything manually. The file is just a .7z file with audio for the data folder.  If its compatible with that well then use away. This is my first mod ever uploading in case it wasn\'t apparent :)

Ok mod manager d/l doesn\'t work yet will work on it later tonight and figure out how to do it

EDIT- Screw the gd mod manager unless someone wants to tell me directly how to get it to work. I don\'t feel like d/l it and risking 3 gigs of mods I already have installed so bleh.


Other files uploaded

Sexy Lydia Voiceover    http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14622
author: maveric83eq
